channel.title: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!
channel.description:
All three of which are tied for most recent Global Moderator!
Lord knows we need the help. :D

item.title: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Mybb, post:82, topic:236942”]Greeny wrong wrong wrong. plz shut the fuck up on matters you have no clue about

  1. Being Canadian Myself i am quite happy that another canadian Is a moderator because it gives me a sense of welcoming.

  2. Don’t take this personal What the hell is up with Americans making lame ass jokes to Canadians honestly cough healthcare cough

  3. He may be still going through puberty But that might Jump into his Irl behavior, how the fuck do you know that he could suddenly flip out because he’s “changing”

Proud Albertan![/quote]

greeny isnt american you ignorant piece of turd

Read full topic

item.source: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!

item.title: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Mybb, post:82, topic:236942”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=312795.msg2492916#msg2492916 date=1224228400]

we’re surely fucked.

Nah, give them a chance, they’re good users of the forum, even though I used to quarrel with Thug-life quite often, but we were both appointed MoparScape moderator and we put the difficulties behind us… Best thing ever.

Tico135 may be a little young to be appointed to much power, but he seems to be pretty mature and definitely was a good candidate for the position… Good luck Tico135, you’ll need it when you have to put up with my spam posts!

Yakman is a great choice.

The issue with Tico135, and I don’t mind saying this so he can see it. Is that he’s young.

At thirteen he is probably just hitting puberty, and the second those hormones kick in he could change completely. The issue being, most of the time he’s probably perfectly mature but he could all of a sudden flip. That age is completely unpredictable.

I think the more immature reasons people don’t like his appointment are:

  1. He’s Canadian
  2. Previously a moparscaper
  3. Not been around too long
  4. Still is a moparscaper

Heh, good luck.

Oh Yakman, and thug-life are both British so epic win right there!
[/quote]

Greeny wrong wrong wrong. plz shut the fuck up on matters you have no clue about

  1. Being Canadian Myself i am quite happy that another canadian Is a moderator because it gives me a sense of welcoming.

  2. Don’t take this personal What the hell is up with Americans making lame ass jokes to Canadians honestly cough healthcare cough

  3. He may be still going through puberty But that might Jump into his Irl behavior, how the fuck do you know that he could suddenly flip out because he’s “changing”

Proud Albertan![/quote]

Haha, you fucking imbecile, re-read my post idiot. I said this is the general feel from other members of the forum - I did not at any point say they were the feelings of myself (which I expressed separately).

Please, don’t pretend I know nothing about something, when you can’t even interpret my posts correctly. Clearly, it is you whom lacks knowledge in more than just one area.

The random capitalization and poor English is annoying, if you wish to insult me next time please do so in a better manner.

Read full topic
item.source: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!

item.title: Congrats to Thug-life, Tico135, and yakman!
item.dc:creator: @Mybb Mybb
item.description:
@Mybb wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:35, topic:236942”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=312795.msg2492911#msg2492911 date=1224227780]

we’re surely fucked.

Nah, give them a chance, they’re good users of the forum, even though I used to quarrel with Thug-life quite often, but we were both appointed MoparScape moderator and we put the difficulties behind us… Best thing ever.

Tico135 may be a little young to be appointed to much power, but he seems to be pretty mature and definitely was a good candidate for the position… Good luck Tico135, you’ll need it when you have to put up with my spam posts!

Yakman is a great choice.
[/quote]

The issue with Tico135, and I don’t mind saying this so he can see it. Is that he’s young.

At thirteen he is probably just hitting puberty, and the second those hormones kick in he could change completely. The issue being, most of the time he’s probably perfectly mature but he could all of a sudden flip. That age is completely unpredictable.

I think the more immature reasons people don’t like his appointment are:

  1. He’s Canadian
  2. Previously a moparscaper
  3. Not been around too long
  4. Still is a moparscaper

Heh, good luck.

Oh Yakman, and thug-life are both British so epic win right there![/quote]

Greeny wrong wrong wrong. plz shut the fuck up on matters you have no clue about

  1. Being Canadian Myself i am quite happy that another canadian Is a moderator because it gives me a sense of welcoming.

  2. Don’t take this personal What the hell is up with Americans making lame ass jokes to Canadians honestly cough healthcare cough

  3. He may be still going through puberty But that might Jump into his Irl behavior, how the fuck do you know that he could suddenly flip out because he’s “changing”

Proud Albertan!

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:65, topic:236942”][quote author=Cald Panda link=topic=312795.msg2494357#msg2494357 date=1224310049]

[quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=312795.msg2494345#msg2494345 date=1224309194]
Congratz. All of you deserved Gmod… /nerds
[/quote]what makes them a nerd? That there a member of this forum like you?
[/quote]You seen their online times? They are really high.[/quote]

Probably no higher then what you spend playing video games such as runescape. We’re all here, we’re all nerds in at least some way. Good mod candidates though I agree tico may be a little young. Not my descision though and I have nothing against him.
